headline: Peter Thiel Cuts Stake In PayPal Mafia Company Tesla. Musk Issues This Warning.
summary: Peter Thiel's hedge fund Thiel Macro sold around 76% of its stake in Tesla during the third quarter, according to the 13F filing, as the billionaire decided to reduce his holdings in fellow PayPal Mafia-member Elon Musk's EV giant amid possible AI bubble risks.  Thiel Macro sold 207,613 TSLA shares in Q3, cutting its Tesla position by about 76%.  After those sales, Thiel's fund holds 65,000 shares of Tesla, which remain its largest investment, valued at $28.91 million and representing 38.83% of the portfolio.

headline: The 1 Thing That Can Slow AI’s Growth — And 3 Stocks That Will Profit From It
summary: Because artificial intelligence (AI) demand is growing so rapidly, and data centers are such power-hungry operations, the one thing that will slow AI’s rapid ascent is energy supply. The surge in AI applications requires vast computational power, with data centers consuming electricity equivalent to small cities and projected to increase demand tenfold by 2030. This ... The 1 Thing That Can Slow AI’s Growth — And 3 Stocks That Will Profit From It
